Wait!: Hello, Leo... My name's Linus.
等等！: 你好，里歐……我叫萊納斯。

Wait!: I've heard all about you, and your parrot family.
等等！: 我聽說了你的事情，包括你的鸚鵡家庭。

Wait!: It's really something special!
等等！: 真的很特別！

Wait!: Aye, lad... Linus lives on the mainland with the rest of us.
等等！: 對啊，小子……萊納斯和我們其他人都生活在大陸上。

Wait!: After hearing your story... I wanted to help. So, I talked to Linus here and hatched a little plan.
等等！: 聽到你的故事之後……我想幫幫你。所以，我跟萊納斯談了談，想到了一個小小的計劃。

Wait!: Go on, Linus... tell him.
等等！: 萊納斯，繼續吧……告訴他。

Wait!: Leo...
等等！: 里歐……

Wait!: I'd like you to come back with us, to Stardew Valley.
等等！: 我想讓你跟我們一起回星露谷去。

Wait!: It's a beautiful place... not as warm as here, but still full of life... and I live right in the middle of it!
等等！: 那個地方很漂亮……沒這裡溫暖，但是生機盎然……而且我住的地方就在正中心！

Wait!: I know the lay of the land, and many things about the waters, the trees, the animals, and more...
等等！: 我精通那邊的地形地貌，以及河川、樹木、動物，還有好多……

Wait!: You see... I'm a child of nature, too. You might say we're 'birds of a feather'.
等等！: 所以說……我也算是大自然的孩子，我和你是同類。

Wait!: But, I'm getting old... And I'd like to teach someone all that I've learned before moving on...
等等！: 不過，我已經老了……我想要在走之前把我學到的東西都傳授給一個人……

Wait!: Leo... will you come back with us?
等等！: 里歐……你願意跟我們回去嗎？

Wait!: L... leave the island?
等等！: 離……離開這座島？

Wait!: I can take you back for a visit any time!
等等！: 我可以隨時帶你回來看看的！

Wait!: But, lad.... You can't live here forever...
等等！: 但是，小子……你總不能在這裡生活一輩子……

Wait!: You know, there are other children back home, too. I'm sure they'd love to meet ya...
等等！: 星露谷還有很多其他的孩子，他們肯定也希望可以看到你……

Wait!: O... other kids?
等等！: 其……其他的孩子？

Wait!: What do you think, @?
等等！: @，你覺得呢？

Wait!: I think it's a great idea.
等等！: 我覺得這主意不錯。

Wait!: I think he should stay here.
等等！: 我覺得他應該留下來。

Wait!: It's up to Leo...
等等！: 還是看里歐的決定……

Wait!: Well, let's not forget... the choice is really up to Leo...
等等！: 嗯，我們還是別忘了……最後還是要里歐自己決定……

Wait!: I understand. This is Leo's home, after all.
等等！: 我明白。這裡畢竟是里歐的家。

Wait!: ...It's hard to make changes. But sometimes It's for the best.
等等！: ……想做出改變很難，但是有時這確實是好的。

Wait!: Still... the choice is really up to Leo.
等等！: 不過……最終還是要里歐自己決定。

Wait!: I'll go...
等等！: 我跟你們走……

Wait!: Great!
等等！: 太棒了！

Wait!: But... my family...
等等！: 但是……我的家庭……

Wait!: She says...
等等！: 她說……

Wait!: She says the parrots are all happy for me.
等等！: 她說鸚鵡們對我感到高興。

Wait!: ...And that they want me to start the next chapter of life, wherever it may lead...
等等！: ……他們想讓我開啟生命的下一個篇章，無論它會導向哪裡……

Wait!: And no matter what happens... they'll always be my family... forever.
等等！: 而且無論發生什麼……我都是家裡的一員……永遠。

Wait!: Goodbye!
等等！: 再見！

Wait!: I'm ready!
等等！: 我準備好了！

Wait!: A new arrival to the valley...
等等！: 星露谷到來了一位新村民……

Wait!: It seems our little town is growing!
等等！: 我們的小鎮越來越熱鬧了！
